channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a Unicornasaurus get a magic paintbrush back in 'Unicornasaurus', then in 'The Grumple Games', Dora helps Hearty win the Grumple Games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: When things start to mysteriously disappear around the dollhouse, Gabby and Pandy play detectives.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is bedtime and Peppa calls Kylie Kangaroo and is surprised to learn it's not morning or winter where she is! Daddy Pig explains this using a big ball to represent the earth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef and friends host a celebration of everyone's favourite holiday traditions. Chef makes his marvelous Mish Mesh cookies, saving one for Santa.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails in 'Pups Save a Melon Festival', then in 'Pups Save A Cow', Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. He decides it would be quicker to ride back and he discovers riding scooters is such fun. He shows Mummy Pig how fun it is too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While Mummy Pig is enjoying a spa day out, Daddy, George and Peppa explore the rest of the shopping centre.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Peppa and her friends go to school early to have breakfast together.

channel.desc: Grampy Rabbit's new jet pack shoots off into the distance and he ends up on top of a snowy mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Daddy's car goes missing it's up to Detective Potato to find it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help.

channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora celebrates Papi-Dora Day with her dad in 'Dora's Song For Papi', then in 'Pirate Piggies', Dora hunts for golden treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby unboxes a Paper Cup Popper that provides an endless supply of paper cups. As she takes it around the dollhouse, all the Gabby Cats find ways to use the cups.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is playing at Suzy's house and they find out that Granny Sheep is moving in! She transforms the dull spare room and attic into an exotic boudoir and creative studio.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Marshall performs some Dino dentistry in 'Pups Save a Sore Dino', and then in 'Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs', a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a wild Dino ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: When the Hidden Jungle animals appear to be uncharacteristically frightened, Marshall discovers a saber-tooth tiger has been stalking them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: When the Duke of Flappington steals a levitation gem from the castle and uses it to raise Barkingburg into the clouds, Skye must beat her biggest fears to lead the team in their biggest rescue yet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharkdog is desperate to help Mr. Heubel's art project, but everything he tries pushes Heubel away.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: When Sharkdog and Max erase Mom's latest video report they decide to reshoot it themselves with some help form the Sharkpack.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: When Sharkdog gets tired of being Mia's favorite thing to squeeze, he gets her a sharkdog toy but quickly gets jealous of the attention she shows it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and Zeg are showing off their robot powers to their dinosaur friends. When they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must get the babies home safely.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A bad haircut threatens to ruin more than just Steve's good looks in 'Bad Hair Day!', then in 'Kanga Ruiner!', the team travels to Australia to stop a giant Mecha-Roo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Meteorite finds a night club in the forest in 'Disco Smurf', then in 'Dwayne's New Toy', Diaper Daddy is looking for a more loving family after being betrayed by Handy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Marshall Kitty gets trapped in a life-sized pinata in 'Pups Save a Hum-nata', then in 'Pups Stop the Foggy Skies', Humdinger pushes fog into Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control in 'Pups Save the Teetering Tower', then in 'Pups Save the Spelunkers', will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold star.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting an adventure park. Miss Rabbit is in charge, and they have fun working their way around an obstacle course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family hire a canoe from Miss Rabbit. They imagine they are in a jungle and then actually bump into Mrs Crocodile. Then Mr Lion invites them to a picnic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family have gone on holiday, staying in a teeny tiny little holiday home near the beach. They discover that even when it rains, they can have lots of fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are going to the Water Park. Miss Rabbit is in charge. There are lots of fun things to do at the water park but first you need to put on your swimsuit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Julius loses his tooth in 'Pups Save the Tooth Fairy', then in 'Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art', all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Two robots take on more than they can handle in 'Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends', then in 'Pups Save the Rainbow', Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that drains Adventure Bay of colour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Boots win the Rainforest Race in 'Rainforest Race', then in 'Bok Bok Birthday', Dora invites friends to Big Red Chicken's birthday party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle introduces the playgroup to the wonderful world of poetry - and the wonderful world of wooly socks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Daddy Pig gets a parking ticket, Peppa and George learn that grown-ups have rules just like children - and get told off too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have been sailing with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Back at the clubhouse, they discover a jukebox - but it is very noisy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa can't find his old metal detector to look for the key for George's new toy robot lost in the long grass.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The team must put pause their summer plans in 'Auntie Freeze!', then in 'Goin' Camping!', Annabelle takes the team camping without their powers, and must save the day when things go wrong.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must find the missing flounder in 'Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder', then in 'Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex', the pups help track down the missing Mini Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Seagulls snatch the raffle prize in 'Hum-Patrol to the Rescue!', and in 'Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga', a rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on a mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups dig tunnels for new books in 'The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser', Mix, Charger, and Wheeler surprise Rubble.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race.

channel.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The family has all gone to the caves for a day out and Grampy Rabbit is their tour guide.

channel.desc: When Peppa meets Father Christmas at the supermarket, she invites him to her playgroup's Christmas play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.desc: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.desc: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.
